about_the_game:
[/url] This is the free version of Defiled Survivors, a medieval themed, action roguelite game that challenges you to defeat thousands of enemies and bosses in order to progress through levels. As a player, you can choose from different characters, each with their own attributes and play styles. To enhance your character's abilities, you can purchase upgrades, runes, and companions. The game requires you to move around the map, searching for treasures and leveling up to improve your chances of survival. As you progress through the levels, the difficulty increases, and you'll face tougher enemies and bosses. The free version of the game provides a taste of what Defiled Survivors has to offer, but some features and assets may be limited or unavailable compared to the full version of the game. However, even with these limitations, players can still experience the core gameplay mechanics and enjoy the challenge of battling their way through hordes of enemies. [img][/img] [img][/img] [img][/img] Content in prologue: [list] [*] Two characters [*] Bunch of active & passive skills [*] 1 level [/list] Controls: Supports mouse, keyboard, controller

name: Defiled Survivors: Prologue

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo T8100
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460M
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

short_description: Slay the night creatures and save the church, you are the last hope! Defiled Survivors is a time survival medieval game with rogue-lite elements, where you choose your character's path and slay hundreds of enemies on your way.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish
